logic: The system must identify a duplicate account by querying the data repository using the provided ID Number (idNo). The check is performed against existing accounts regardless of their status (Normal/Closed) as the lookup does not filter by status in the provided context.
condition: When processing an Account Opening request (BizCode = '001')

logic: If an account with the same ID Number already exists, the system must reject the opening request. The rejection record must contain: Status = '0' (Failure), Error Code = 'ID_EXISTS', and the Account ID of the *existing* account.
condition: If 'existing' account object is not null (found by idNo)
